snippet: Joseph Pabon, 27, was found guilty of kidnapping and murder in the death of Eridania Rodriguez, whose body was found in an air-conditioning duct of the building where they worked.
lead_paragraph: Joseph Pabon, 27, was found guilty of kidnapping and murder in the death of Eridania Rodriguez, whose body was found in an air-conditioning duct of the building where they worked.

headline.seo: Joseph Pabon Guilty in Killing of Cleaning Woman
headline.main: Handyman Is Convicted of Killing Cleaning Woman
headline.print_headline: Handyman Is Convicted of Killing Cleaning Woman
